name: Mirror Monk
description:
You control a Mirror Monk. A monk that never attacks, but is able to reflect punches or projectiles, mirroring freehand attacks or through the resources the environment offers. We named REFLECT 'EM UP genre.

Download, unzip, enjoy.

W/A/S/D - move up/move left/move down/move right

SPACE - Dodge

SPACE + W/A/S/D - Dash Dodge

K - Reflect

L -  take weapon (knife)

ESC - Pause

MOUSE (menu) - interact
